mapper.select: SELECT p.point_no, p.point_price, p.point_list, p.point_date, (SELECT s.space_name FROM space s WHERE s.space_no = (SELECT g.space_no FROM us_group g WHERE g.group_no = p.group_no)) AS space_name, p.point_balance FROM point p JOIN `user` u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id='bb'
SELECT user_point FROM user WHERE user_id='bb'
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_point = user_point + #{point_price} WHERE user_id = 'bb'
